RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: SetMetaValue
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: Sets the meta (vol/pan/dly) value in selected range for all notes. Type in the value then press return and all notes will have their relevant meta values changed. To change the field effected type V (for vol) or P (for pan) or L (for delay)
RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: scripts
